definition: from/through/via/to follow/to obey/to engage in (an activity)/never (in negative sentence)/(Taiwan pr. [zong4]) retainer/assistant/auxiliary/subordinate/related by common paternal grandfather or earlier ancestor
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: The executioner had never seen anything like this!
sentences.chinese: 刽子手从来没见过这种情形。

sentences.english: No one, he claimed, had ever seen such fans before.
sentences.chinese: 还声称，从来没人见识过这样的扇子。

sentences.english: I've never had alcohol before and was very excited.
sentences.chinese: 我之前从来没沾过酒，所以很兴奋。

sentences.english: Never having been to Switzerland before, he longs for a trip there.
sentences.chinese: 因为从来没去过瑞士，他期待一趟瑞士之旅。

sentences.english: Since then I have never sung by day.
sentences.chinese: 从那时开始，我就从来没在白天唱过歌。

sentences.english: But I have never stolen from anyone else.
sentences.chinese: 不过我从来没偷过其他人的东西。

sentences.english: Live in NYC and never been to the Statue of Liberty?
sentences.chinese: 居住在纽约市但是从来没看过自由女神像？

sentences.english: The hatred between these two families never quite flickered out.
sentences.chinese: 这两家人之间的仇恨从来没真正消除。

sentences.english: Q. Why don't you see giraffes in elementary school?
sentences.chinese: 为什么你从来没在小学看到过长颈鹿？

sentences.english: For 28 years, I've never come out with any picture at such standard.
sentences.chinese: 多少年来，我从来没画过如此水准的画。

sentences.english: She never got caught but, once, the alarm went off.
sentences.chinese: 她从来没被抓住过，不过有一次，警报响了。

sentences.english: Is it true that the costume never made it to Northern California?
sentences.chinese: 这件服装从来没去过北加州，是真的吗？

sentences.english: I said, You never had me to dinner!
sentences.chinese: 我说，你从来没请我用晚餐。

sentences.english: I had never seen as much good food in my life, and I chowed down.
sentences.chinese: 我人生中从来没见过这么多好吃的东西，我吃了个饱。

sentences.english: I ve never heard such a rigmarole .
sentences.chinese: 我从来没听过像这样的长篇废话。

sentences.english: In short, the Father never denied his Son any request.
sentences.chinese: 总而言之，父神从来没推却祂儿子任何一个的祈求。

definition: many times/on more than one occasion
the first time/for the first time
always/at all times/never (if used in negative sentence)
to speak the truth/truth to tell/frankly
erhua variant of 壓根|压根[ya4 gen1]
